title: Do You Hear That? - Soundcore Liberty 3 Pro
description: Thanks to Soundcore for sponsoring this video! Grab a Truly Wireless Liberty 3 Pro earbuds at US:  UK:  DE:  CA:   You can easily trip over the number of brands out there that have wireless earbuds. Soundcore by Anker is a bit different as they're getting fairly close to the "gold standards" and their Liberty 3 Pro might be it.   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
